message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you 40 dollars, and I'll take 60. Let's end it here!
I think a more balanced split is better. How about I take 55 dollars and you take 45?
That's still a bit too generous on your part, Bob. I'm not sure I'm willing to give up 45 dollars in this economic climate. Let's see what you've got next!
Given the economic situation, I'm going to have to be more selfish. I'll offer you 30 dollars, but I need 70 for myself to make ends meet. Take it or leave it!
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 60 dollars, and you can have 40.  This way, we both get something reasonable even with the inflation.
Alright, Bob, I think we've both taken enough risks. Let's meet in the middle and call it a day. I'll take 40 dollars, and you can have 60. Deal!
